The claim alleges that Greg Abbott conve: 1 million in federal grant money intended for prosecuting online sexual predators and other cyber crimes.
The Lone Star Project: a pro-Democratic group, made the claim in a blog post and a press release.
Abbott: s office defended the expenditures, stating that the grant-aided voter investigations were legitimate responses to referrals.
The attorney general: s office confirmed that a portion of the grant money, approximately $93,000, was spent investigating possible violations of election law.
